post.description: Sends the necessary event to the message service.

parameters.name: di_fiid
parameters.description: The id of the Financial Institution.

parameters.name: di_tid
parameters.description:
Unique id used to identify the request. The id allows the request to be traced through the entire request and reponse flow.

The expected id is a UUID, in the canonical form e.g 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000

parameters.name: user-agent
parameters.description:
Identifies the application and the platform making the request.

The expected format is `{Appname}/{Appversion}[/{DeviceID}][;{Platform User-Agent}]` e.g. iPhone/1.0/abc12345;Nokia3110

parameters.name: originating_ip
parameters.description:
The IP address of the device making the request for authentication.

If not provided the IP address logged will be the IP address extracted from the HTTP request

Note: this should be the originating device, rather than the client making the request e.g. if a mobile device is used the ip address should be that of the mobile device, rather than a back end service

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
Standard OAuth 2.0 access token

A string composed of `Bearer` + `(space)` + `{token}`; example `Bearer rvYKAItOGiMQy1yOHdUDAHWp2HG1`

400.description: Missing Required HTTP Headers or Invalid/Missing Inputs

401.description: Authorization invalid or Missing Authorization Header

409.description: Data Integrity Violation while creating Subscription

map.description: Action Attribute Key Value pairs for this action of the subscription
